He pierced through the atmosphere at blinding speed, but his energy
remaine=
d intact. His body had been wrecked and he needed a new one. He
hovered the=
re for a moment, trying to know where he should go. His
darker heritage kic=
ked in: fear. He felt it like a ripple on a pond.
He headed for the spark, =
cringing at the uneasy feeling. A volcano, a
base near it. He went through =
the walls until he saw the source, a
cowering bot, submitted to evil suffer=
ings. He had to help her out,
and he had to hide. He entered the metal shel=
l of her body until he
found her spark.
